Class WordHelper

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.BaseHelper
us.mn.state.dot.tms.WordHelper
public class WordHelper extends BaseHelper
Static Word convenience methods accessible from the client and server.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

  • Method Details

    • iterator

      public static Iterator<Word> iterator()
      Get an iterator

    • lookup

      public static Word lookup(String name)
      Lookup a Word in the SONAR namespace.
      Parameters:
      name - Unencoded word to lookup. Will be converted to uppercase to determine if it exists.
      Returns:
      The specified word or null if not in namespace

    • encodeWord

      public static String encodeWord(String n)
      Encode a word to avoid sonar namespace issues, for example "US89/191". Words are sonar names.
      Parameters:
      n - Word to encode
      Returns:
      Encoded word

    • decodeWord

      public static String decodeWord(String n)
      Decode a word
      Parameters:
      n - Word to decode
      Returns:
      Decoded word

    • isBanned

      public static boolean isBanned(String w)
      Check if a word is banned

    • abbreviate

      public static String abbreviate(String txt)
      Abbreviate text if possible.
      Returns:
      Abbreviated text, or null if can't be abbreviated.
